title: Competition metric details + script
description: Evaluation metricIn this notebook I'll try to explain and implement the competition metrics. If you find a bug please leave a comment. Thanks. And do not forget to vote :)  UPDATE v2 - BUG fix! Inside the calculate_precision function I did not pass the form param, it was hardcoded coco. This caused wrong calculations if you used the pascal_voc format. UPDATE v3 - Optimized with Numba!  I optimized the code, so with help of numba it will run much faster Added the tips of Alexander (see the comments below) Importnat change: In some of the methods the order of the gt_box, pred_box arguments were mixed. Please double check your code. The correct order is gt first, pred second.  UPDATE v4 - Another BUG fixed!
